mapper.select: select c.nombre as nombre, c.documento as documento, c.telefono as telefono, c.direccion as direccion, c.email as email, c.vetado as vetado, ir.id as id, ir.fechainiciorenta as fechainiciorenta, ir.fechafinrenta as fechafinrenta , i.id as idItem, i.nombre as nombreItem, i.descripcion as descripcion, i.fechalanzamiento as fechalanzamiento, i.tarifaxdia as tarifaxdia, i.formatorenta as formatorenta, i.genero as genero , ti.id as idTipoItem, ti.descripcion as descripcionTipoItem FROM VI_CLIENTES as c left join VI_ITEMRENTADO as ir on c.documento=ir.CLIENTES_documento left join VI_ITEMS as i on ir.ITEMS_id=i.id left join VI_TIPOITEM as ti on i.TIPOITEM_id=ti.id
